code: import React from'react';import{NavLink}from'react-router-dom';import{Home,Calendar,BarChart3,Send}from'lucide-react';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Sidebar=()=>{const navItems=[{path:'/',label:'Dashboard',icon:Home},{path:'/scheduler',label:'Post Scheduler',icon:Send},{path:'/calendar',label:'Content Calendar',icon:Calendar},{path:'/analytics',label:'Analytics',icon:BarChart3}];return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("aside",{className:"sidebar",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("nav",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("ul",{className:"nav-menu",children:navItems.map(item=>{const IconComponent=item.icon;return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("li",{className:"nav-item",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(NavLink,{to:item.path,className:_ref=>{let{isActive}=_ref;return"nav-link ".concat(isActive?'active':'');},children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(IconComponent,{className:"nav-icon"}),item.label]})},item.path);})})})});};export default Sidebar;
